descriptions.content: “Poetry” in Tibet: Glu, mGur, sNyan ngag and “Songs of Experience” by Roger R. Jackson. Tibetan Belles-Lettres: The Influence of Daṇḍin and Kṣemendra by Leonard W. J. van der Kuijp. Peter-Daniel Szanto, “atra kim prayojanam? An Essay on the Reception and Naturalization of kāvya in Tibet,” in Indian Languages & Texts through the Ages: Essays of Hungarian Indologists in Honour of Prof. Csaba Töttössy, edited by Csaba Dezső, 209-55. Delhi: Manohar Publishers, 2007.
